snapsapp_info.Msg: The Snaps app is provided for informational and planning purposes only.

snapsapp_install.Msg: SnapsApp can be easily installed on your device homepage. On iOS, use Safari to load app, click the share button and then select Add to Home Screen. On Android, use Chrome to load app, click Install. On Windows, using Edge or Chrome, load app, open browser menu and select Install snapsApp. On MacOS, use Safari to load app, click the install button in the address bar.

snapsapp_update.Msg: Close any open instances. Then reopen app from home screen.

snapsapp_refresh.Msg: To get the lastest version of the calculator in your browser, click on the refresh button. This will clear any current calculation.

snapsapp_aboutus.Msg: snapsApp was designed by BanquetConsulting and implemented by Insight Sciences Corporation.

main_reset.Msg: Reset all entered values in the calculator.
